text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Miracle. I have a spell to teach you. 
Are you ready?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
That's it. According to Teio, that spell
will result in a honey drink most ideal
to you.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha…… So that's what it's about.
Thanks, I'll try ordering with that
next time.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I have to say, Teio is really attentive. 
Sure, we're peers…… but to think she'd 
know my tastes even though we barely 
ran together……

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Though your air flows differently,
your currents are equally swift. The
"miracle" in you must have caught her
eye.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Miracles only happen to those who have 
the unwavering will to attain them.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Teio, me…… and you, too, Miracle. 
We have the same resolve, even if 
our goals differ.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
So remember, "mild, light, squeeze of
lemon". It's "mild, light, squeeze of
lemon", okay?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hehe…… Thank you, Zephyr. 
I got it now, I won't forget.
